mapper.select: select * from( select ROWNUM RNUM, pb_main_img_stored, pb_md_name, sale_price,pb_sale_status,pb_post_status, entity_number , quality_grade from( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, pb_main_img_stored, pb_md_name, sale_price,pb_sale_status,pb_post_status, entity_number , quality_grade FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( select pb_main_img_stored, pb_md_name, sale_price, pb_sale_status,pb_post_status,gl_productboard.entity_number,quality_grade from gl_purchase, gl_productboard where gl_purchase.entity_number = gl_productboard.entity_number UNION select pb_main_img_stored, pb_md_name, sale_price, pb_sale_status,pb_post_status,gl_productboard.entity_number, quality_grade from gl_consignment, gl_productboard where gl_consignment.entity_number = gl_productboard.entity_number) ORDER BY entity_number DESC) WHERE pb_sale_status != 'sold' and pb_post_status = 'onboard' ) where entity_number in(select entity_number from gl_liked where member_id = #{member_id})) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
